name: Gary Goodwin
text:
Professional, friendly, service. Awesome female bartender. On point and ready to ensure you are treated with the highest regards.
Cant get better service.

name: William Wegmann
text: Good drinks

name: Amada Jackson
text: Hansome waiter

name: Anna Harmon
text: Delicious

name: Preston Turner
text: Great authentic Mexican food with a fantastic staff. I know the family who owns the business and they're very good people. If you're around the area don't hesitate to visit Pepito's.

name: Win W.
text:
I was in this restaurant for a late lunch. There was not many people there. Service was good. Our waiter was attentive. We didn't want for anything. However, we ordered two taco salads. The taco salad was not good. The tortilla shell was not good in flavor. There was way too many large pieces of onion, red and green bell peppers marinated in some sort of dressing. The beef looked like greasy canned dog food mixed with the refried beans. My mother and I were not impressed with this place. We will not recommend or eat here again.

PROS:
Their warm chips and salsa they bring you when you sit down is good.
Service from our waiter
They have excellent sweet tea

name: BARUCH NUÑEZ
text: Best Mexican restaurant in Tuscaloosa

name: James Barber
text: Good Mexican restaurant with lots of variety on the menu. Friendly staff. Good for families.

name: Patrick McKane
text: At one time this was by far one of the best places to eat in Tuscaloosa.  Unfortunately over the past few years they have gone waaaayyyy down hill.  The grill is a shadow of its former self.

name: Chris Lee
text: Some of the best margaritas, the grill is very good, the other food is okay.  If you don't want to eat at the grill you can get better Mexican food in town.

name: Beverly Armstrong
text: They make wonderful quacamole fresh when ordered here.  The food is always great as well as the service.

name: Giovanni Zimotti
text: The food was just okay, some of the glasses were really dirty, and it was incredibly hot. Two stars only because the waiter was super nice and helpful.

name: Claudia L Murphy
text: Best tacos & burrito supremes & green salads. Love the salsa. Competitive prices. Been going there since the 90's when it was El Pollo Tapitillo

name: Amanda Reyes
text: The food here is excellent. There are great margarita specials on Tuesday and Thursday!

name: Jennifer Thompson
text: Always love it. I'm able to walk back to the grill, and we sit around this huge open grill kitchen. Its Bar Height, covered in handpainted, I assume authentic! tiles. You can order, drink, while you watch your dinner prepd & cooked Casual. Very laid-back atmosphere. There is also a seperate bar and a man dinning room.  .

name: Morgan Funderburk
text: Honestly most of their food is mediocre but the veggie quesadilla is delicious. I know it sounds basic but you're also eating Mexican food in Tuscaloosa so grow up.

name: Dagan Bond
text: The first time I came here it was aweful and the only saving grace it had was the amazing margaritas! The bar tender knows how to make drinks. The second visit was better! Dont go near the taco salad! Its disgusting. However, the traditional enchiladas, quessidilla, and nachos are really good. As said in a previous reciew, its quiet lunch place, as most of the traffic comes in at night. The waiters always seem to change on us, wasn't sure who to tip. I had to give it three stars for the first visit but the second was a big improvement!

name: Jeff O'Mary
text: It was not good at all me,my wife, an my daughter go in we get set down took our drink orders all was alright.Then the waiter comes out an says we dont have anymore chips we said ok we was fine with that we understand sometimes you just run out of things but about 20 minutes later this table full of young girls walk in an 3 baskets of chips get brought right out to them so i ask the waiter what about us he still said im sorry we are out of chips i said no your not yall just brought that table 3 baskets an they just walked in we been here for 20 or 30 min now he said im sorry. Then he brings us our food with no silverware i ask how are we suppose to eat this without silverware he laughed walked off an 10 min later still no silverware so we get up i talked to the manager an told him what had happened an i wasnt paying for it cause we couldnt eat it anyways an we left so we will never go back there again an i wouldnt recommend them to anyone.

name: Jeff Coleman
text: Great lunch spot. Enchilada Verdes is excellent!

name: Blythe Joslin
text: Been going here since they opened, great food and the best margaritas in town!

name: Katie Grass
text: Always delicious and the service is good.

name: PJ Talley
text: Great food and friendly and fast service

name: grecia villarroel!
text: Fresh mexican food totally recommend

name: Melanie728 Lucky
text: This place is awesome!!

name: Felicia Robinson
text: Awesome place

name: Ross U
text: Amazing and underrated!!

name: Raphael Duarte
text: Food is so delicious!!! Margaritas are best in town!!!!!!

name: wolf lonnah
text: Nice

name: Elite Car Audio
text: Fantastic service. Quoted me an extremely good price on a gun that every other gun store couldn't even touch! Over 100$ off the other stores prices. Very satisfied , Can't wait to purchase.

resp.text:
Hi Mike,
Thanks for taking the time to rate us and leave a comment. We strive to treat everyone like family.  Welcome to our family!!

name: Rick Ward
text: Linden Ace Hardware is a great small town hardware store. The staff is very knowledgeable and extremely helpful. If they don't have what you need they can get it within a week. The owner will bend over backwards to help.

resp.text: Thanks for your support.

name: Jimmy Miller
text: Wonderful people,  very helpful.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to rate us.  We always enjoy seeing you and your family.

name: Dj T May
text: This store has a variety of everything. They carry more items than most Ace Hardware stores. The staff and management ate super friendly to customers. Also their prices are cheaper than the Ace in Butler Alabama.

resp.text: Thank you for your rating and kind comments

name: Jennifer Ashdown mcclinton
text: I love this place they have a lot of helpers and they have everything Bill loves TOOLS 😀

resp.text: Jennifer, Thank you so much for your review.  We strive to be everyone's number one place to shop.

name: Sandra Ward
text: I'm grateful for this local store, because they have what I need for working in the yard, for bird watching, AND they have all the necessary tools for home improvement! At every visit, I'm greeted with a smile and attentive service.

resp.text: Thank you for rating us!  We appreciate you guys.

name: Tommie Younger
text: Great hometown store.  Owner is very helpful and courteous.

resp.text: Thank you for your comments.  I always enjoy seeing you in the store or speaking with you on the phone.  Have a great day.

name: David Pritchett
text: Great place to shop; helpful staff; honest and friendly owner.

resp.text: David,  I really appreciate you taking the time to rate us.  It is always great to see you in the store.

name: Randy Gibbs
text: Great home town hardware store...

name: Kemp Akins
text: Great Store

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to rate our store.

name: Tom Johnson
text: Helpful staff

resp.text: Thank you for your comments.  We appreciate your business

name: Dorothy Baldwin
text: Neighborhood store

resp.text: Thank you for rating us on Google

name: Michael Nash
text: One stop shop

resp.text: Thank you for rating our store

name: Richard Brewer
text: Nice course for a sub-par/mediocre golfer like me. Mostly par 4's with a couple of par 5's and 3's. Hole 7 is my favorite(par 3) which tees off from up high over a Gulley below to the green up high but lower than the tee box.

resp.text: Thank you Richard!

name: Ryan Turner
text: Horrible I will NEVER play this place again. Might as well been in a pasture with cows or pigs.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Ryan. I'm sad to learn you didn't enjoy our course. As you're likely now aware, we built a very rural and country golf course in a very rural and country setting. We do the best we can with what we have to do it with. I'm sorry we failed to meet your expectations and I will happily refund you for what you paid today.

name: Robert Stanfield
text: Great Course

resp.text: Thank you Robert!

name: dennis gordon
text: Great place to have fun golfing...great people running the place.

resp.text: Thank you so much Dennis!

name: Kameron Jones
text: 2nd best course in anderson right behind fish creel parking lot at least you can find the balls there.

resp.text: Thank you, Kameron, for your review.

name: Randall Gordon
text: Wonderful place

resp.text: Thank you Sir!

name: John Old Old
text: Good course.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: John Jones
text: Best course in Anderson

resp.text: Thank you, John!
